name: Anyspend
description: AnySpend is a next-generation fiat on-ramp and swap platform built for the onchain economy. AnySpend sits at the center of a growing consumer and gaming ecosystem on Base. The platform connects traditional payment rails (ACH, card, and local bank transfers) directly to onchain liquidity via Calderaâ€™s metalayer routing infrastructure, allowing users to instantly purchase, swap, or fund wallets across chains with a single transaction.
